items.question: What quality can I expect from AI human videos?
items.answer: Our AI models produce high-definition videos with realistic human avatars, ensuring an engaging and professional output. You can achieve up to 30 seconds of polished video suitable for various marketing channels.

items.question: Can I customize human motions in the video?
items.answer: Yes! You can specify actions and emotions in your script to guide the AI in producing precise motions that match your vision, from confident presentations to friendly greetings.

items.question: What is the best script length for effective engagement?
items.answer: Scripts between 50-200 words yield optimal engagement with our AI human videos, providing enough context for the avatar to convey the message effectively.

items.question: How is this different from traditional video production?
items.answer: Unlike traditional production, our AI-generated videos eliminate the need for on-site filming, cutting down not only costs but also time significantly while allowing for immediate adjustments.

items.question: Can I use these videos for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Absolutely! All videos generated include full commercial rights enabling you to use them across diverse platforms—no hidden fees or royalties.

items.question: Is there a way to see before and after examples?
items.answer: Yes! We provide case studies and sample videos showcasing the capabilities of our AI-generated human videos for effective marketing.

items.question: How long does it take to create a video?
items.answer: Video generation takes approximately 1-2 minutes, depending on your script and customizations, making it one of the fastest solutions in the market.

items.question: What types of businesses benefit most from AI human videos?
items.answer: Any business aiming to enhance engagement and communication can benefit, from retail to technology, improving personal interactions with compelling visual storytelling.

items.question: Do I get support if I encounter issues while using the tool?
items.answer: Yes! We offer comprehensive support including live chat, detailed user guides, and active community forums for troubleshooting and best practice sharing.
